name.baseName: Waste washing machine ; Waste plastics,scrap iron and steel,scrap non-ferrous metals ; Dismantling ; All sizes; NESPS2
废洗衣机 ; 废塑料、钢铁废碎料、废有色金属 ; 拆解 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)is/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)is/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 本工业过程涉及废旧洗衣机、废塑料、废钢铁和废有色金属的拆解与回收。该过程适用于各种规模的终端处理设施，通过回收利用减少垃圾填埋，并回收有价值的材料，供制造业重复使用。该过程还涉及尾气治理技术，旨在减少回收作业产生的颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）排放。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码42,四级代码4210文件，在完整版文件中第2458页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为废塑料、钢铁废碎料、废有色金属，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)is/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标颗粒物（无组织）的末端治理技术是/，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物（无组织），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
